Title: Freddy's Dead: The Final Nightmare
Writer: Wes Craven, Rachel Talalay, Michael De Luca
Actors: Robert Englund, Lisa Zane, Shon Greenblatt
Plot: Dream-haunting Freddy Krueger returns once again to prowl the nightmares of Springwood's last surviving teenager, and of a woman whose personal connection to Krueger may mean his doom.
